system.description:
Effect: [Linked Attack: Spit Up][Linked Attack: Swallow]
The user gains 1 Stockpile Stack for 5 activations. A Stockpile Stack raises the user's DEF and SPDEF stage by +1. The user may only have a maximum of 3 Stockpile Stacks at a time.

actions.name: Stockpile
actions.description:
Effect: [Linked Attack: Spit Up][Linked Attack: Swallow]
